components.name: Single Plan Pricing Card
components.description: Clean single pricing plan with feature list, prominent pricing, and trial offer
components.styleNotes: Clean card design with prominent price display, feature list with checkmarks, and clear CTA button.

components.name: Dual Plan Pricing Comparison
components.description: Two-tier pricing comparison with monthly/yearly toggle and detailed feature comparison
components.styleNotes: Clean comparison layout with toggle switch, side-by-side plan cards, and clear feature differentiation.

components.name: Three-Tier Pricing Table
components.description: Comprehensive three-tier pricing table with FREE, PRO, and Elite plans, monthly/yearly toggle, and detailed feature comparison
components.styleNotes: Comprehensive three-column pricing layout with clear tier differentiation, badges, and detailed feature lists.
